articles.description: Traveling with marijuana can be risky, although those risks can be lessened with a medical marijuana card. articles.description: Lawmakers in the House of Representatives will hold a hearing next week to discuss marijuana reform issues at the federal and state levels. Marijuana was listed as a Schedule 1 drug by the federal government in 1970, categorized [...]
